title: Puppy_Linux_Dpup_Wheezy_archive_25-May-2014
description:
NEW Dpup Wheezy-EmCE

by stemsee

released 25-May-2014

more info at:
 <a href="
http://www.murga-linux.com/puppy/viewtopic.php?t=93957" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.murga-linux.com/puppy/viewtopic.php?t=93957</a>


Wheezy-EmCE.iso  size 425.7 MB

Here is another Dpup Wheezy I built. not much different from the previous one. It has: 

 kernel-3.14.2-EmSee-pae 
 wine-1.7.17, QQ2013 
 Jack 
 Jack-rack/eq/mixer 
 python2.7 
 cups 1.5.3 
 vlc 
 zarfy 
 

 It is a stepping-stone build. But very functional. 

 
 QQ2013 is normally a .deb package which decompresses to 500mb as it has a 200mb tar.gz compressed and patched wine prefix, I got rid of the tar.gz saving 200mb....plus some optimisations so that wine (36mb pet) uses the same prefix - by making ~/.wine a symlink to ~/.longene/qq, so you can see it is a relatively small puppy! 

 EDIT: I found that jackd is running on startup so in order to get sound with vlc etc open a terminal and type killall jackd !
